title: No Way Out
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Summer’s almost over, nya~~~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin has a plan to get away from school. Rinko, want to come along?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin will come, nya. There’s no way Rin can go to school with this much unfinished homework!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin too. Shioko and Shizuko will be so mad~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Umi-chan and Eli-chan will be mad at Rin too......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>What faraway place can we go...... Shoot! Ugh, Kasumin used up all her pocket money! Rinko, what about you!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin has some left, nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Like, how much?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Umm...... about enough for a ramen noodle refill.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>We can’t get away like this~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
